name: psa10_app
description: # PSA 10  This is an app for showing off colectibles and finding a community to talk, share, and trade collectible cards. We created this app as a final project for our full-time web development bootcamp with DevPoint Labs.

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy && echo 'Client Built'
